ygData.subject: Re: Pet Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: I will be making the trip from Felwithe, not sure of the way but have gone to the docks. I have not taken the boat to Freeport yet, but I
ygData.messageBody:
<excerpt><smaller>I will be making the trip from Felwithe, not sure of
the way but have gone to the docks.

I have not taken the boat to Freeport yet, but I assume that is the way
to go initially. I will be looking for maps for my journey today and hope
to start this evening. Is High Hold near Halas?

</smaller>

</excerpt>

go to freeport, and follow the directions in the FAQ (not sure where the
FAQ is though, someone on this list should know).


Qorona of the Volition Guild, 16th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

-------------------

tim borrelli

computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire
